DOC.brief_summary: This is a clinical study to investigate the safety and efficacy of hylastan in treating patients with symptomatic osteoarthritis (OA) of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Hylastan to Methylprednisolone Acetate in Patients With Symptomatic Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with OA of the knee Have tried but not been sufficiently helped by conservative treatment, such as weight reduction and pain medications Prior or concomitant treatments that would impede measurement of safety and efficacy
